§72021§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o39 pages, 5 figures. The argument is simplified and the global comparison theorem is strengthened, asserting absolute continuity of the weight difference profile increment to the increment of Brownian local time on any
given compact interval, compared to the earlierversion's comparison across random patches. The local limit theorem is also proven for an additional type of point of increase\u00a7r
